Package com.marginallyclever.communications

Provides the classes necessary to create a connection to a robot and the classes the GUI uses to communicate with the connected robot.
Since:
v7
Version:
v7
Author:
Peter Colapietro
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    NetworkConnection
    Created on 4/12/15.
    NetworkConnectionListener  
    TransportLayer
    Lists available connections of a type (serial, ethernet, smoke signals, etc) and opens a connection of that type See also "OSI Layers" (Google it)
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ConnectionManager
    handles requests between the UI and the various transport layers
    TransportLayerPanel
